headline: Hilton Earns Top Recognition in Condé Nast Traveler’s 2025 Readers’ Choice Awards from U.S. and U.K. Readers
summary: MCLEAN, Va., October 10, 2025--As a global leader in hospitality, Hilton (NYSE: HLT) releases the results of the Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards, spotlighting 47 properties within its brand portfolio that have been recognized by Condé Nast Traveler readers in both U.S. and U.K. markets. This recognition reflects Hilton’s ongoing commitment to delivering world-class experiences across the globe, with hotels and resorts from Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, LXR

content.title: Hilton Earns Top Recognition in Condé Nast Traveler’s 2025 Readers’ Choice Awards from U.S. and U.K. Readers
content.summary: MCLEAN, Va., October 10, 2025--As a global leader in hospitality, Hilton (NYSE: HLT) releases the results of the Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards, spotlighting 47 properties within its brand portfolio that have been recognized by Condé Nast Traveler readers in both U.S. and U.K. markets. This recognition reflects Hilton’s ongoing commitment to delivering world-class experiences across the globe, with hotels and resorts from Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, LXR

thumbnail.caption: Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts saw incredible recognition at its properties around the world, including the Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal, recognized as the No. 1 Resort in Western Mexico. (Photo: Hilton)
